backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, bookings, and reviews with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI update requirements and associated frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including custom color variables and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading fonts, metadata, root container, and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all routes and shared layout with header, footer, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Authorization guard that checks Internet Identity login and admin status before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading and error recovery logic.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Logo component displaying the shop logo with fallback text rendering on image load failure.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component showing shop info, quick links, contact details, and a branded copyright section.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, navigation, call button, and mobile menu using a sheet drawer.
frontend/src/constants/shopInfo.ts: Static shop information object with name, phone numbers, and address.
frontend/src/data/galleryItems.tsx: Gallery item definitions containing IDs, descriptions, images, icons, and detailed feature lists.
frontend/src/data/servicesCatalog.tsx: Service catalog organized by categories, each listing related repair services with descriptions and estimated times.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Hook to check whether the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Hooks for creating, fetching, updating, and publicly retrieving bookings through the backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Defines a React Query hook to fetch all payment instructions from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Implements hooks to fetch and sort reviews and submit new reviews, with cache invalidation via React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base theme variables and dark mode styles with an amber/orange color scheme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and wrapping the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBookingsPage.tsx: Admin page for listing bookings, viewing details, and updating booking statuses with UI feedback and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Customer booking form handling validation, submission, and success confirmation, integrated with identity and backend booking API.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays shop contact information including phone numbers, location, and business hours with styled UI cards.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a grid of gallery items with images, badges, and a dialog for viewing item details.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Shows available payment methods and loads payment instructions from the backend with a loading state.
frontend/src/pages/PublicBookingsPage.ts: Fetches and displays all public bookings with status indicators, error handling, and a booking detail dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsPage.tsx: Lists customer reviews and provides a form with validation for submitting new reviews.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Presents service categories and their services in an accordion layout with a call‑to‑action section.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Page component rendering the shop’s hero image, contact bar, and main shop info using SHOP_INFO and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utilities for converting between bigint nanosecond timestamps and formatted date-time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata summarizing app goals, features, issues, and versioning for the mobile repair service app.
